text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the HP OMEN 17-cb0040nr 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The HP OMEN 17-cb0040nr 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the HP OMEN 17-cb0040nr 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the HP OMEN 17-cb0040nr 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the HP OMEN 17-cb0040nr 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
